findings.details: Back-to-top button uses 46px sizing; acceptable but can be larger for coarse pointers.
Back-to-top button lacks explicit focus-visible outline styling.
Manual scan found no placeholder/example.com links in posts/pages. External URLs not live-checked due to offline audit.
Core meta tags and JSON-LD are present; no blocking issues found in templates.
Recent enhancements improve scannability; minor interaction polish remains.

recommendations: Increase back-to-top button tap target size for coarse pointer devices
Add explicit focus-visible outline to the back-to-top button
